flawed_nl_solution:
Lisa had 20 - 5 = <<20-5=15>>15 marbles.
Since Cindy gave 12 marbles, then she only has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=8>>8 marbles left.
Since Lisa received 12 marbles, then Lisa has 15 + 12 = 26 marbles now.
Hence, Lisa has 26 - 8 = <<26-8=18>>18 marbles more than Cindy.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
